text: I didn’t know that! That will solve it. Thanks you <@U22PJPGK0>! And that’d be awesome if we can use IN on text/number fields. ORing conditions would also be most welcome!
Darn it that didn’t help me afterall, because I don’t  know the row_id of the rows I’m trying to get.  Found a way around it for now.
Hello Community,  I have a question: How to append front end form to hubdb table?

Hi There, I am using the HubSpot API to update/insert records in HubDB successfully, however the pages using these database entries do not get refreshed unless I hit the "update" button in the Hubdb GUI, this is something that did not occur before, is there a "commit" step in the API I now need to send?
I believe there's a publish endpoint: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/publish-draft-table>
Thanks ! that worked. The update button was not there when I started the API use.
